Source.Name: perl-test-trap
Source.Summary: Test::Trap - Trap exit codes, exceptions, output, etc.
Source.Description: Primarily (but not exclusively) for use in test scripts. A block eval on steroids, configurable and extensible, but by default trapping (Perl) STDOUT, STDERR, warnings, exceptions, would-be exit codes, and return values from boxed blocks of test code. The values collected by the latest trap can then be queried or tested through a special trap object.
